thread.section_title: Japan Rail Pass Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Japan Rail Pass | japanrailpass.com.au
thread.title: A Lee
thread.title_full: Japan Rail Pass reviewed by A Lee

author: A Lee
title: A Lee
text: I've used Japan Rail Pass to purchase my rail pass twice now. The first time I checked multiple websites and found them to be the cheapest. The second time I went straight to them to purchase. I later found out from a friend they had purchased a cheaper one elsewhere. Next time I will research prices again but likely I will just purchase from Japan Rail Pass because I know they send out the passes quickly.
